item.title: QSR 40/40 List for 2020: America’s Hottest Startup Fast Casuals
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: We were named one of America’s Hottest Startup Fast Casuals for 2020 on QSR! Visit us in Clairmont Mesa or Carmel Mountain to see and taste the hype around our outstanding shawarma and Middle Eastern eats 😋 📍11640 Carmel Mountain Rd Ste. 124 📍7051 Clairemont Mesa Blvd Ste. 301 See QSR’s complete 40/40 List here: https://www.qsrmagazine.com/content/4040-list-2020-americas-hottest-startup-fast-casuals
item.content:encoded:
We were named one of America’s Hottest Startup Fast Casuals for 2020 on QSR! Visit us in Clairmont Mesa or Carmel Mountain to see and taste the hype around our outstanding shawarma and Middle Eastern eats 


11640 Carmel Mountain Rd Ste. 124

7051 Clairemont Mesa Blvd Ste. 301
See QSR’s complete 40/40 List here: https://www.qsrmagazine.com/content/4040-list-2020-americas-hottest-startup-fast-casuals

item.title: Resisting our Hummus is Impossible
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: Hummus is a staple in Middle Eastern food. Simple, and delicious! And when combined with traditional ingredients and methods, its irresistible! Hummus is our guac! Grab a side of Simsim’s outstanding Hummus today, but be warned…you won’t stop dipping! Did you know that simsim (sesame) is a main ingredient in Hummus? Get a side (or [...]
item.content:encoded:
Hummus is a staple in Middle Eastern food. Simple, and delicious! And when combined with traditional ingredients and methods, its irresistible!

Hummus is our guac! Grab a side of Simsim’s outstanding Hummus today, but be warned…you won’t stop dipping!

Did you know that simsim (sesame) is a main ingredient in Hummus?

Get a side (or a bucket) of our authentic and mouthwatering Hummus today!

Resisting our Hummus is impossible !

item.title: Quzi Roasted Lamb at Simsim Outstanding Shawarma Catering
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: Quzi Roasted Lamb at Simsim Outstanding Shawarma Catering Celebrate the Holy month of Ramadan with authentic Quzi! Gather your friends and family around or traditionally made Quzi Roasted Lamb, now on our catering menu! Ramadan Kareem! Complete your gathering of loved ones with Simsim’s mouth watering Quzi, found exclusively on our catering menu.
item.content:encoded:
Quzi Roasted Lamb at Simsim Outstanding Shawarma Catering

Celebrate the Holy month of Ramadan with authentic Quzi! Gather your friends and family around or traditionally made Quzi Roasted Lamb, now on our catering menu!

Ramadan Kareem! Complete your gathering of loved ones with Simsim’s mouth watering Quzi, found exclusively on our catering menu.

item.title: Introducing Cinco De Mayo Shawarma at Simsim Outstanding Shawarma
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: Introducing Cinco De Mayo Shawarma Cinco de Mayo is a month long celebration at Simsim! Come enjoy your favorite fresh Mexican ingredients wrapped into our signature Saj bread wrap! Our Cinco de Mayo Shawarma is only here for the month of May! The Cinco de Mayo Shawarma is here!! From May 5th through the end [...]
item.content:encoded:
Introducing Cinco De Mayo Shawarma

Cinco de Mayo is a month long celebration at Simsim!

Come enjoy your favorite fresh Mexican ingredients wrapped into our signature Saj bread wrap! Our Cinco de Mayo Shawarma is only here for the month of May!

The Cinco de Mayo Shawarma is here!! From May 5th through the end of May enjoy fresh Mexican ingredients wrapped in our fresh Saj bread!

The Simsim Cinco de Mayo Shawarma! has Avocado, grilled bell peppers & onions, cilantro, pickle sour cream and marinated chicken wrapped in our signature Saj bread!

item.title: What is a Shawarma?
item.dc:creator: simsim
item.description: Shawarma is made by layering marinated strips of seasoned meat & chicken on a vertical spit (rotisserie). The meat is roasted slowly on all sides as the spit rotates in front of, or over, a flame for hours using heat. The meat is shaved off the stack with a large knife. Our Shawarma can then [...]
item.content:encoded:
Shawarma is made by layering marinated strips of seasoned meat & chicken on a vertical spit (rotisserie). The meat is roasted slowly on all sides as the spit rotates in front of, or over, a flame for hours using heat.

The meat is shaved off the stack with a large knife. Our Shawarma can then be eaten with our freshly baked saj bread or in our custom bowl with vegetables and house-made sauces.
